英文公告.附加說明: [Method of contract award]: Based on the total price. The evaluation date will be set separately. The principle of contract award is to select winners during the evaluation and carry out price negotiations in sequential order.[Amount of bid bond]: Bid bond is not required for service procurement.[Others]:1. When the documentation is purchased in person, requests for amendment or supplements shall be made immediately if any page is missing or the seal designated for tender invitation is absent. For mail order, tenderers shall request amendment or supplements at the entity where the documentation was purchased prior to the closing date. Otherwise, no objection will be accepted if the tender forms submitted are deemed invalid.2. Tender forms without the seal of the Management Section, Seventh River Management Office, WRA, MOEA, are deemed invalid.3. For any interpretation questions or concerns about violation of laws in regard to the content of the tender documentation, please submit a written form to the Seventh River Management Office four days before tenders are opened. Late submissions will not be accepted.4. To report any illegal conduct by entities, please mail a complaint to the Procurement Supervision Unit of MOEA (address: No. 15, Fujhou Street, Taipei City; telephone: 02-23971592), or contact the Water Resources Agency at P. O. Box 47-7, Taichung or (04)22501578.5. If the tender documentation is downloaded from the Internet, a hard copy form of the electronic certificate shall be provided.
